name: WorseSadTrombone
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: worse sad trombone
des: Alexa already has a Sad Trombone skill built-in, but that sound effect has too much production value. A full band of harmonized trombones hold back the full brunt of their disappointment with the professionalism of their acoustics. Now, Alexa can express exactly how much you're worth by making the sad trombone noises on her own.
